title: Bug Splat after champion select and constant reconnect
body:
I keep getting bug splats after champion select right when i'm bout to load into the game. This happens every time after I just boot up my computer after the latest patch. and all I get is reconnect button that sends me into a bug splatting loop. To fix it I have to do some really annoying steps before I can play, which is really annoying. After every computer start up. Takes a while too. 

Yes I have reinstalled and league has done some automatic repairs as well. Problem still persists. I've been getting a whole lotta problems with this month and I have no clue why. 

Please help.

replies.body:
1. Update your GPU drivers
2. Check your DirectX is up to date
3. Check your Windows is up to date
4. Try some of the other steps in this article: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes
5. Submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

I think I may have found the problem but not sure how to solve it.
